DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate use AirSeal insufflation system impair lung function patient less conventional system patient undergo robot-assisted laparoscopic radical prostatectomy ( RALP ) . Therefore examine lung function surgery . As second purpose study , subgroup , investigate influence gas insufflators ( AirSeal conventional ) hemodynamics surgery . Furthermore study change lung perfusion-ventilation-ratio use electric impedance tomography technique .
DOC.brief_title: Lung Function After Robot-assisted Radical Prostate Ectomy
